code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{getBlogPosts}from'../data/blogData';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[blogPosts,setBlogPosts]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const loadPosts=async()=>{try{const posts=await getBlogPosts();setBlogPosts(posts);}catch(error){console.error('Error loading blog posts:',error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};loadPosts();},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"hero",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Quantitative Investment Analysis Blog"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Learn the cutting-edge algorithms and methods in quantitative investment analysis."})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading posts..."})})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"hero",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Quantitative Investment Analysis Blog"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Learn the cutting-edge algorithms and methods in quantitative investment analysis."})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-grid",children:blogPosts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/blog/${post.slug}`,className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`/assets/images/${post.image}`,alt:post.title,className:"card-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card-title",children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-excerpt",children:post.excerpt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-meta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:post.category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:post.date})]})]},post.id))})})]});};export default Home;
